body:
### Problem

Hello

I Installed neovim on my computer using scoop (i also tried installer & choco) and after i typed nvim i get these errors:
""noclear" [New]                                                                                                                                         Cannot open file "noclear"                                                                                                                              Error detected while processing C:\Program Files\Vim\vim91\ftplugin.vim:                                                                                line    1:                                                                                                                                              E480: No match: 9scriptline    3:                                                                                                                                              E488: Trailing characters: Vim support file to switch on loading plugins for file types: # Vim support file to switch on loading plugins for file types line    4:                                                                                                                                              E749: Empty buffer                                                                                                                                      line    5:                                                                                                                                              E488: Trailing characters: Maintainer:^IThe Vim Project <https://github.com/vim/vim>: # Maintainer:^IThe Vim Project <https://github.com/vim/vim>       line    6:                                                                                                                                              E488: Trailing characters: Last change:^I2023 Aug 10: # Last change:^I2023 Aug 10                                                                       line    7:                                                                                                                                              E488: Trailing characters: Former Maintainer:^IBram Moolenaar <Bram@vim.org>: # Former Maintainer:^IBram Moolenaar <Bram@vim.org>                       Pattern not found: did_load_ftplugin = 1                                                                                                                line   19:                                                                                                                                              E488: Trailing characters: No need to define the function again.:   # No need to define the function again.                                             line   23:                                                                                                                                              E492: Not an editor command: def LoadFTPlugin()                                                                                                         line   25:                                                                                                                                              E488: Trailing characters: We assume b:undo_ftplugin is using legacy script syntax:     # We assume b:undo_ftplugin is using legacy script syntax       line   30:                                                                                                                                              E492: Not an editor command:   var s = expand("<amatch>")                                                                                               line   31:                                                                                                                                              E121: Undefined variable: s                                                                                                                             line   44:                                                                                                                                              E492: Not an editor command: enddef                                                                                                                     Error detected while processing C:\Program Files\Vim\vim91\indent.vim:                                                                                  line   16:                                                                                                                                              E492: Not an editor command: def s:LoadIndent()                                                                                                         line   21:                                                                                                                                              E492: Not an editor command:   var s = expand("<amatch>")                                                                                               line   22:                                                                                                                                              E121: Undefined variable: s                                                                                                                             line   33:                                                                                                                                              E492: Not an editor command: enddef" 


because of this error i couldn't install lazyvim

thank you

### Steps to reproduce

nvim

### Expected behavior

?

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.11.0

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

Windows 11 24H2

### Terminal name/version

Windows Terminal, Alacritty

### $TERM environment variable

ansi-256color

### Installation

scoop

comment_data.body:
>  C:\Program Files\Vim\vim91\ftplugin.vim

These are the runtime files for Vim, not Neovim. Your installation is broken. Download the release from our releases page or raise the issue with scoop.

> > C:\Program Files\Vim\vim91\ftplugin.vim
> 
> These are the runtime files for Vim, not Neovim. Your installation is broken. Download the release from our releases page or raise the issue with scoop.

I Did installed Release Neovim from the github page and still same problem

> Always test with `nvim --clean`.

I Tested With nvim --clean same problem

I know this is a little on the aged side, but to anyone else who spent hours on the same issue like me, check the values of any environment variables included in the output of `:version`. In my case $VIMRUNTIME was set to the vim (not neovim) runtime, because I had launched neovim inside of a vim terminal window, then closed the other vim buffers and completely forgotten I was still in vim. No amount of cleaning the nix cache, simplifying configs, rebuilding etc were ever going to fix that.

title: Error After Installation on Windows
